name: My Sandbox
description:
This is kind of a side project that I'll work on overtime. If this gets decent attention maybe I'll work on it full time! Also, join the Discord Server! https://discord.gg/YBbUynq

ALL FEEDBACK WANTED

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to jump
Control to slide (while moving)
Press 1 to hold item one (when you aren't carrying the environment)
Press 2 to hold item two (when you aren't carrying the environment)
Press the item number you are holding to holster
LMB to fire (if you're holding an item), or LMB to pickup / throw (if you aren't holding an item), LMB to pick up an item to add to your inventory (if you have space, you only have 2 slots)
RMB to drop the environment object you are holding
R to reload
Q to drop the item you are holding
TAB to toggle spawn menu
ESC to toggle pause menu (I know you can still turn your camera and fire your item)

Extra information:
If you have an item as number 2 and you drop number 1, number 2 becomes number 1

'Prop surfing' and 'grenade jumping' are intentional, not bugs

Performance will get worse overtime (especially if you're using an object that could be destroyed), this will get fixed (at least mostly) in the next update

The secret that was present in Build 3 is still available here. You'll know it when you see it.

I'm accepting screenshots for the page (and also new main picture for the game). Got something cool or interesting? Put it in the Discord server or dm me the images!!
